Container.Name: GoRetro
Container.Overview: GoRetro - Generate gamelist XML files for retro gaming frontends with metadata scraping from ScreenScraper and media downloads.
Container.Description:
Generate gamelist XML files for EmulationStation and other retro gaming frontends. Scrape metadata from ScreenScraper API including game information, ratings, genres, release dates, and download media files (thumbnails and images). Supports caching for fast re-runs and parallel downloads for maximum performance.
USAGE: Mount your base ROM directory (e.g., /mnt/user/roms) which should contain subdirectories for each system (snes, nes, gb, gba, etc.). Set the SYSTEM variable to match the subdirectory name. The container will automatically scan /roms/[SYSTEM]/ for ROM files.
Example structure: /mnt/user/roms/ ├── snes/ (mount base as /roms, set SYSTEM=snes) ├── nes/ ├── gba/ └── psx/
Container.Changes: ###v1.0.0 (2025-01-03) - Initial release with scraping and media download support - Live progress dashboard - Parallel media downloads - Smart caching system - Multi-system support (50+ systems)

Config.Name: System Name
Config.Description: System name for better scraping accuracy (e.g., snes, nes, gb, gba, genesis, psx). Leave empty to disable scraping. See documentation for full list of supported systems.

Config.Name: Enable Scraping
Config.Description: Enable metadata scraping from ScreenScraper API. Requires SYSTEM to be set.

Config.Name: Download Media
Config.Description: Download media files (thumbnails and images) from ScreenScraper. Requires scraping to be enabled.

Config.Name: ScreenScraper User ID
Config.Description: Your ScreenScraper username (REQUIRED for scraping). Create a free account at https://www.screenscraper.fr/

Config.Name: ScreenScraper User Password
Config.Description: Your ScreenScraper password (REQUIRED for scraping).

Config.Name: ScreenScraper Dev ID
Config.Description: ScreenScraper Developer ID (REQUIRED for scraping). Get from your ScreenScraper profile page.

Config.Name: ScreenScraper Dev Password
Config.Description: ScreenScraper Developer Password (REQUIRED for scraping). Get from your ScreenScraper profile page.

Config.Name: ScreenScraper Software Name
Config.Description: Software name for API identification (optional, uses default if empty).

Config.Name: Skip TLS Verification
Config.Description: Skip TLS certificate verification. WARNING: Only use temporarily if ScreenScraper SSL certificate is expired. Set to 'true' or 'false'.

Config.Name: ROM Directory (Base)
Config.Description: Base ROM directory containing all system subdirectories (read-only recommended).

Config.Name: SNES ROMs
Config.Description: Super Nintendo Entertainment System ROMs (leave empty if using base ROM directory).

Config.Name: NES ROMs
Config.Description: Nintendo Entertainment System ROMs (leave empty if using base ROM directory).

Config.Name: Game Boy ROMs
Config.Description: Game Boy ROMs (leave empty if using base ROM directory).

Config.Name: Game Boy Advance ROMs
Config.Description: Game Boy Advance ROMs (leave empty if using base ROM directory).

Config.Name: Genesis ROMs
Config.Description: Sega Genesis/Mega Drive ROMs (leave empty if using base ROM directory).

Config.Name: N64 ROMs
Config.Description: Nintendo 64 ROMs (leave empty if using base ROM directory).

Config.Name: PlayStation ROMs
Config.Description: PlayStation (PSX) ROMs (leave empty if using base ROM directory).

Config.Name: Atari 2600 ROMs
Config.Description: Atari 2600 ROMs (leave empty if using base ROM directory).

Config.Name: Output Directory
Config.Description: Directory where gamelist.xml will be saved. Typically the same as ROM base directory. File will be saved to /output/[SYSTEM]/gamelist.xml

Config.Name: Media Directory
Config.Description: Base directory for downloaded media files. Media will be saved to /media/[SYSTEM]/media/thumbnails and /media/[SYSTEM]/media/images

Config.Name: Cache Directory
Config.Description: Cache directory for ScreenScraper API responses. Speeds up re-runs significantly. System-specific caches are stored in subdirectories.

Config.Name: Output Filename
Config.Description: Output XML filename. Use default unless you need a custom name.

Config.Name: API Delay (ms)
Config.Description: Delay between API calls in milliseconds. 0 = no delay. 1000-2000ms recommended for free ScreenScraper accounts. Premium accounts can use 500ms.

Config.Name: Download Workers
Config.Description: Number of parallel download workers. 4-8 recommended. Higher values = faster downloads but more bandwidth usage.

Config.Name: Limit Games
Config.Description: Limit number of games to process (0 = no limit). Useful for testing before processing large collections.

Config.Name: ROM Directory (Internal)
Config.Description: Internal container base path for ROMs. Actual path is /roms/[SYSTEM]. DO NOT CHANGE.

Config.Name: Output Directory (Internal)
Config.Description: Internal container base path for output. Actual path is /output/[SYSTEM]/gamelist.xml. DO NOT CHANGE.

Config.Name: Media Directory (Internal)
Config.Description: Internal container base path for media. Actual path is /media/[SYSTEM]/media/. DO NOT CHANGE.
